title: External kanban implementation for motion and drives manual book at PT Schneider Electric Manufacturing Batam
abstract: On this project we implemented the external kanban for decreasing the Days of Inventory (DIN) in Schneider Electric Manufacturing Batam (SEMB). This implementation is considered as one of the inventory management projects as well as the just in time project in the SEMB. As the result of this project, the DIN is decreased from the starting point condition.
contributors: I Nyoman Sutapa (Advisor 1); Siana Halim (Examination Committee 1)
source: Undergraduate Thesis No. 01021429/IND/2010; Luh Sandra Adishesa (25406113)
